title: IN PICTURES: Naagin 2 actor Karanvir Bohra shares lovely posts about his favourite TV couples : Celebrity, News - India Today
text:
Celebrity IN PICTURES: Naagin 2 actor Karanvir Bohra shares lovely posts about his favourite TV couples The actor declared his love for these celeb couples on a social media site recently. And it is super-sweet. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Anvita Singh A + A - TV actor Karanvir Bohra. Picture courtesy: Instagram/karanvirbohra 
Naagin 2 actor Karanvir Bohra isn't a shy man, he has often declared his love for his family and friends on social media sites. He isn't afraid to express what he feels. And this Valentine's week, the actor is busy declaring his undying love and affection for Indian television's most celebrated couples. A photo posted by à¤•à¤°à¤£à¤µà¥€à¤° à¤¬à¥‹à¤¹à¤°à¤¾ (@karanvirbohra) on Feb 10, 2017 at 6:17am PST 
Karanvir has been sharing adorable posts about these couples. 
The actor first shared a super-sweet post about Shabir Ahluwalia and his wife Kanchi Kaul. He wrote, "Know this badmash bachcha @shabbirahluwalia since we were britherrrrs in #kyunkisaasbhikabhibahuthi, he is as shararti as he was then, I've always admired his happy-go-lucky, easy-going attitude towards life. But what made me really take notice was, whenever he would speak about his girlfriend and now his beautiful wife @kanchikaul he would become all shy n coy, he is still the same. I see strength when I see these two, I see compatibility that doesn't need any effort, I see friendship of 2 lovers, I see a couple who are like hand-in-glove, a perfect match. 
#couplegoals #keeptheloveinspiring #strength #compatibility #friendship #happyvalentinesday." A photo posted by à¤•à¤°à¤£à¤µà¥€à¤° à¤¬à¥‹à¤¹à¤°à¤¾ (@karanvirbohra) on Feb 11, 2017 at 12:28am PST 
Then he shared these adorable posts about Maniesh Paul and his wife Sanyukta, and Ravi Dubey and his actress-wife Sargun Mehta.
